titleStmt.title: Office of the Surgeon General of the United States of America

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: Office of the Surgeon General of the United States of America

body.p: Office of Medical Administration of the United States Army. Established in 1798 as the administrative office of the United States Marine Hospital Service by the United States Congress.

ab.bibl: "History,"Office of the Surgeon Generalhttps://www.hhs.gov/surgeongeneral/about/history/index.html, viewed on August 6, 2020.
